title: New: Spirit of America – Soon
body:
Hard-hitting scuzzy lo-fi from New Hampshire’s **Spirit of America**, a currently anonymous project with little to no information available online as to the identity of this rather unique vocalist.

His debut track, _Soon_, is part Coma Cinema, mixed with a far amount of late 80’s, early 90’s grunge. So the quality of the recording is questionable, yet it’s partly this that makes it so loveable; it’s raw and seems to depend upon it’s inadequacies. Check out Soon below.

_welcome to hell, boy_
